tool_description: Converts physical floor plans, architectural drawings, or building layouts into digital format with spatial coordinates and room identification for accessibility analysis.

building_id.description: Unique building identifier from Building Data Collector

floor_number.description: Floor level to digitize (use negative numbers for basement levels)

plan_source.description: Source of floor plan: architectural_drawings, existing_digital, field_sketch, as_built_plans

scale_ratio.description: Drawing scale in format like 1:100 or 1/4_inch_1_foot

measurement_units.description: Units used in the plan: feet, meters, inches

error_messages: Invalid building ID: Provide a valid building identifier from Building Data Collector.
Unrecognized plan source: Use one of the specified source types.
Invalid scale format: Provide scale in format like 1:100 or 1/4_inch_1_foot.
Unsupported measurement units: Use feet, meters, or inches.
Floor number out of range: Ensure floor number is within the building's floor count.
usage: Provide building ID and floor number to digitize. Specify the source of your floor plan and its scale for accurate digital conversion.

digital_plan_id.description: Unique identifier for the digitized floor plan

room_count.description: Number of identified rooms on this floor

room_labels.description: List of room names and identifiers found on the floor

total_floor_area.description: Total area of the floor in square feet

digitization_accuracy.description: Assessment of digitization quality: high, medium, low
